data.message:
You see the body language? How Em is standing with chest out and hands behind his back. He is the Master. He knows nothing dares to attack him. Even if they do he knows he cant be hit.

No look at Drake (student) his chest crushed in, hands in front of him. Hes nervous and must have his hand ready for many who will challnege him. Even his head is a lil bit bowed down. A clear sign of respect.
